content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The only place I know that serves meat jun. If you are not sure what that is, or not sure if you should try this place. When the wife is craving for food from home we will make the trek out here from Yorba Linda just to get that comfort food.
